summary: Hector and his young mother Paloma go on vacation. Out of season their hotel is deserted. They spend their days sitting on the edge of the swimming pool. Then attractive Jazmin arrives and we see how Paloma loses her son to a summer fling.
cast: María Renée Prudencio|Lucio Giménez Cacho|Danae Reynaud|Carolina Politi|Enrique Arreola|Leonel Tinajero
title: Club sándwich
